What I mean is that I started at the begining and worked my way through the posts and unless the power to lock and unlock has changed since those days, a moderator would theoretically lock the thread only for someone to post a comment after them the same day. There were also comments suggesting that some who were mods then are no longer and that at least one who seemed like an anarchist member is now a mod. There was also gleeful ribbing between those that I think have been mods the entire time falling on both sides of the lock or not debate. It was very different to the now, click if it magically becomes possible (which I never seem to catch) inside joke game that it now is. So I just wondered if that thread was a sort of light hearted war between mods, roughly around 5 years ago, give or take?
